results.content: This is so well explained and everything just works. It's great that Paulo makes the odd error and then you can follow through to see how he fixes them. Terrific stuff!
results.content_html: This is so well explained and everything just works. It's great that Paulo makes the odd error and then you can follow through to see how he fixes them. Terrific stuff!

results.content: Firebase connectivity and Initial application structure is good however the UI has refactoring issues from Lect.64 onwards. I Hope the issue will be fixed soon.
results.content_html: Firebase connectivity and Initial application structure is good however the UI has refactoring issues from Lect.64 onwards. I Hope the issue will be fixed soon.

results.content: The instructor gives a good explanation and good examples but the code is out of date and the connection to Firebase code does not work.  Instructor does not respond so it will be impossible to get help.  The course is not suitable for beginners because you will not be able to follow along without knowing backend development.  Luckily for me I can follow along by creating my own API and Database to connect the app in place of Firebase.  It also means using a different state management and API call system.  Would only recommend the course for those who know about FullStack Flutter development and want to learn Flutter Web.
